page.title: 12RURAL SHOPPING BASKET
page.content: On a leisurely walk around Bodle Street or Ashburnham, you can fill your basket with a wide variety of home grown, home made and farm produce - eggs, milk, cream, honey, chicken and duck and occasionally lamb and pork for the freezer. Villagers often sell excess fruit and vegetables at their gates along with jars of preserves - all excellent quality. The village store at Ponts Green sells a limited variety of goods with meat bread and fish being delivered by shops from the nearby villages. Newspapers are delivered to some parts of the villages. During a good apple harvest you will often see baskets of apples at gateways with a notice imploring you to help yourself.
